sentences.sContent: You know my vagabond and restless habits.
sentences.sContent_eng: You know my vagabond and restless habits.
sentences.sCn: 你知道我的这种流浪汉习惯，我是闲不住的。

sentences.sContent: You know my vagabond and restless habits .
sentences.sContent_eng: You know my vagabond and restless habits .
sentences.sCn: 你知道我的闲游浪荡的习惯。

sentences.sContent: No matter how vagabond our heart are, there are always some things on which we can land, wishing the truest bailment at the moment when missing is passing.
sentences.sContent_eng: No matter how vagabond our heart are, there are always some things on which we can land, wishing the truest bailment at the moment when missing is passing.
sentences.sCn: 无论心情怎样漂泊，总有一些东西可以让我们着陆，在某个刹那，当思念闪过，希望会有最真实的寄托。

synos.tran: 流浪的；流浪者的；浪荡的；漂泊的

remMethod.val: vag (走) + a + bond (音似： 邦德) → 邦德走天下， 是个流浪者 → 流浪者

words.tran: 游民；流浪者；无赖；漂泊者
流浪；漂泊；思想游移不定

trans.tranOther: someone who has no home and travels from place to place
